content: flame or 6 strands total of whatever color s you choose fold your flame strands of yarn in half - the folded loop will be the part pulled through the end of the wick insert hook into the end of the wick and draw the red/orange/yellow yarn through the wick then pull the loose ends through the loop and pull tight © airavocreations 7 and you re done this pattern is protected by a copyright by downloading it you agree to not distribute this pattern in full or in part this pattern is for your use only you may sell finished projects as long as you credit my site by putting my name and link in your description my photos are also protected by copyright you must use your own photos for completed items thanks © airavocreations
